mapper.insert: insert into tbl_post (post_title, post_content, member_id, category_id) values (#{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{memberId}, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: select m.member_name, c.category_name, p.id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_views, p.post_status, p.member_id, p.created_date, p.updated_date from tbl_member m join tbl_post p on m.id = p.member_id join tbl_category c on p.category_id = c.id where p.id = #{id} and p.post_status = 'active'

select m.member_name, c.category_name, p.id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_views, p.post_status, p.member_id, p.created_date, p.updated_date from tbl_member m join tbl_post p on m.id = p.member_id join tbl_category c on p.category_id = c.id where p.post_status = 'active' order by p.created_date desc limit #{count} offset #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_post WHERE post_status = 'active'
